descriptionKey:
[ffcc33]Geonosis:[-][23c8f5] This arid planet houses vast Separatist factories for droids and weaponry. Defend Geonosis![-]

[ffcc33]Required: [-][23c8f5]Guild Galactic Power 80,000,000

[ffcc33]Recommended: [-][23c8f5]Guild Galactic Power 140,000,000+

[ffcc33]Mission Bonuses: [-][23c8f5]Geonosis Heroes (See Details)

zoneDefinition.descriptionKey: Reclaim the Droid Factory from Galactic Republic forces to resume droid production!
Clear out any Galactic Republic forces in the canyons to prevent any surprise attacks!
Assist the core ships as they escape with legions of battle droids!
Retake Separatist Command and prepare for an all-out counteroffensive!
Crush the Galactic Republic forces in and around the arena. [c][f58c96]Beware:[-][/c] A ferocious beast lurks among the chaos inside!
Destroy the Galactic Republic ships as they attempt to provide air support to their ground troops!
The Galactic Republic's formations are breaking.\nPress the advantage!
Galactic Republic forces in the Sand Dunes have gone on the defensive. Destroy them!
Destroy the remainder of the Galactic Republic fleet to claim total air superiority over the battlefield!
The Count must escape with plans for the ultimate weapon. Defeat those who would stand in his way!
Pursue and decimate what remains of the enemy forces to claim total victory on the surface!

reconZoneDefinitionList.goalDescKey: [c][b5e7f5]Reinforce[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Separatist Command[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Petranaki Arena[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Battleground[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Sand Dunes[-][/c], [c][F0FF23]Count Dooku's Hangar[-][/c], [c][b5e7f5]and[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Rear Flank[-][/c] [c][b5e7f5]with a powerful ability![-][/c]

reconZoneDefinitionList.rewardDescKey: Earn bonus TP for each Squadron completed.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey:
[23C8F5]Time limit:[-] [b5e7f5]6 days[-]
[23C8F5]Phases: [b5e7f5]4[-]
[23C8F5]Roster refresh:[-] [b5e7f5]After phase 1, 2, and 3[-]

Exclusive rewards (earned in Special Mission):
[23C8F5]All of your Geonosis Heroes gain the following ability:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Whenever this character defeats an enemy, all Separatist allies gain 1 stack of [c][ffff33]Separatist Affiliation[-][/c] for the rest of battle (max 10 stacks). [c][ffff33]Separatist Affiliation[-][/c] becomes [c][ffff33]Separatist Loyalty[-][/c] at max stacks.
Deal 5% more damage per stack with attacks not based on Health

Deal 50% more damage with attacks not based on Health, at the start of turn recover 10% Health and Protection, and when defeated all other allies with Separatist Loyalty recover 50% of their Max Health and Max Protection and they gain 100% of the defeated ally's Offense and 15% of their Max Health until the end of their next turn

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]Complete Platoon Missions to unlock the following abilities:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey:
[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Summon a Geonosis B1 Battle Droid to the ally slot if it is available. Dispel all buffs on all enemies, which can't be evaded.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] Instead summon a Geonosis B1 Battle Droid Commander to the ally slot if it is available; add Separatist allies gain 50% Turn Meter

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Instead summon a B2 Rocket Trooper to the ally slot if it is available; add Droid allies reset their cooldowns at the start of their turn for 2 turns
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant 20% Turn Meter to a random ally that has no positive status effects.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant 20% Turn Meter to a random ally that has no positive status effects.
Daze all enemies for 2 turns and deal Physical damage to them.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain Offense Up for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 50% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn and a 50% chance to inflict Offense Down for 2 turns. Call target Hero ally to assist.
Inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns and deal true damage to all enemies. Then, this ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 for each defeated ally. This ability starts on cooldown.
B2 Rocket Trooper has +35% counter chance and gains 25% Turn Meter whenever it attacks out of turn.

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] All allies have +15% Offense, doubled for Separatist allies.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] Add all allies have +10% Speed

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +5% Speed; add at the start of each Separatist ally's turn, they recover 5% Health and then equalize Health with all other Separatist allies

[c][F0FF23]Granted to: Separatist characters only[-][/c]

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict 3 Damage Over Time debuffs for 2 turns.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +20% damage; add 2 random enemies affected, and inflict Stagger for 2 turns on those enemies and target enemy

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +20% damage, affect all enemies; add inflict Defense Down, Offense Down, and Tenacity Down for 2 turns

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] All Droid allies have +10% Critical Chance.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +10% Critical Chance; add inflict a Damage Over Time debuff for 2 turns whenever they critically hit an enemy, which can't be evaded or resisted

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +15% Critical Chance and +35% Critical Damage; add gain 10% Turn Meter whenever they critically hit an enemy

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]Complete Platoon Missions to weaken or disable the following abilities:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey:
[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] All Galactic Republic characters have +25% Critical Avoidance and take a bonus turn whenever they defeat an enemy. Also, they gain 5% Turn Meter whenever an enemy gains any bonus Turn Meter.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] -10% Critical Avoidance and Galactic Republic characters don't gain Turn Meter when an enemy gains bonus Turn Meter

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] -15% Critical Avoidance

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (Republic Resolve destroyed)

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Deal massive damage to target enemy and another random enemy. Deal Physical damage to all other enemies and inflict Healing Immunity for 2 turns (starts on cooldown).

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] Remove massive damage to a random enemy

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Remove massive damage to target enemy

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (AT-TE destroyed)

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Deal Physical damage to all enemies, dispel all buffs on them, and inflict Defense Down, Offense Down, and 2 Damage Over Time debuffs for 2 turns.

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] -20% Damage and remove Defense Down and Offense Down for 2 turns

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Remove 2 Damage Over Time debuffs for 2 turns

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (LAAT destroyed)

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The Galactic Republic has amassed some of its best fighting forces in its onslaught on Geonosis. Be on the lookout for Elite characters  not only are they much stronger than normal characters, but they also have powerful Elite abilities![-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Daze them for 3 turns.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies. Dazed enemies take bonus damage equal to 25% of their Max Health. This attack can't be evaded.

Dispel all buffs on all enemies and remove 75% Turn Meter. The Acklay becomes Enraged if it wasnt already. Up to 4 Jedi may be drawn to the battle when the Acklay uses this ability. This attack cant be evaded. This ability starts on cooldown.

At the start of the Acklay's turn, it gains 15% Protection Up (stacking) for each Dazed enemy until the start of its next turn.\n\nAt the start of the Acklay's turn, all Dazed enemies are Exposed for 2 turns. The Acklay takes 50% more damage when attacked during its turn.

The Acklay uses 2 abilities per turn and has +50% Tenacity. The Acklay deals 10% less damage for each Jedi present in battle. Whenever it takes damage, it gains 5% Turn Meter, which can't be prevented. The Acklay is immune to Ability Block, Daze, Fear, Health Down, Shock, Stagger, and Stun, as well as cooldown increase.\n\nWhen the encounter begins, the Acklay becomes Enraged. While Enraged, the Acklay deals 100% more damage. While the Acklay is not Enraged, it has -20% Speed, -25% Offense, and -50% Tenacity.

Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain 20% Turn Meter. Gain an additional 20% Turn Meter if that enemy has more than 50% Health, and an additional 20% Turn Meter if that enemy has less than 50% Turn Meter.
Deal Special damage to target enemy and 35% less damage to all other enemies. If this attack scores at least 2 Critical Hits, Stun the primary target for 1 turn.
Call all Clone allies and one random ally to assist. These Assists deal 40% less damage. Each time an Assist scores a Critical Hit, reduce the Cooldown of this ability by 1.

Clone allies gain 30% Critical Chance, and other allies gain half that amount. Cody gains 60% Defense for each living Clone ally and other Clone allies gain half that amount. Clone allies recover 5% of their Max Protection whenever they use a Basic ability.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant 20% Turn Meter to another random ally with less than 50% Turn Meter.
Deal Special damage to all enemies and Dispel all positive status effects on them.
Clone allies recover 7% of their Max Health whenever they use a Basic ability. This effect can't trigger more than two times before their next turn, and is disabled if Echo is defeated.
Whenever another ally uses a Basic ability during their turn, Echo has a 30% chance to Assist, dealing 40% less damage. This Assist chance is doubled if the attacking ally is a Clone.
Deal physical damage to target enemy and inflict Speed Down for 2 turns. Attack again if enemy is inflicted with Speed Down.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call a random ally to Assist. If the Assisting ally is a Clone, both attackers deal 75% more damage.
Fives has 85% Counter Chance and +50% Counter Damage. Fives gains 15% Turn Meter whenever another Clone ally takes damage and 7.5% Turn Meter whenever a non-Clone ally takes damage.
Enemies defeated by Clone Trooper allies during their turn cannot be revived. Clone allies gain 65 Defense, and other allies gain half that amount.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and remove 25% Turn Meter.

Dispel all negative status effects on all allies and grant them Tenacity Up for 3 turns. Clone allies gain 60% Turn Meter, plus an additional 10% Turn Meter for each effect dispelled this way, and other allies gain half that amount.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy, plus bonus damage equal to 25% of the target's Maximum Health.

Clone allies gain 20% Max Health, and other allies gain half that amount. In addition, whenever an ally suffers a Critical Hit, all Clone allies gain 15% Turn Meter, and other allies gain half that amount.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack deals 5% more damage for each debuff on all allies.
Inflict Marked on target enemy and gain Tenacity Up for 2 turns. This attack can't be evaded or resisted.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and inflict Speed Down and Critical Chance Down for 2 turns.

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityNameKey: Some Guys Have All the Luck
dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: When Ponds falls below 50% Health, he equalizes Health with the enemy squad (limited to once per battle). Whenever an ally is inflicted with a debuff or an enemy gains a buff, Ponds gains 5% Turn Meter.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Potency Down and Speed Down for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Daze them for 2 turns.

Dispel all debuffs on target ally, and that ally gains Entrenched until they are defeated.\n\n[c][ffff33]Entrenched:[-][/c] +50% Defense, deal 25% more damage for each Entrenched ally when attacking, and recover 5% Health and Protection at start of turn; cant be copied, dispelled, or prevented

At the start of battle, ARC Trooper and 2 other weakest allies gain Entrenched. While ARC Trooper is active, whenever an Entrenched ally is defeated, all Entrenched allies' cooldowns are reduced by 2.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with an 80% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn.
All allies gain Critical Chance Up for 2 turns and 15% Turn Meter. They also gain an additional 20% Turn Meter for each defeated ally.
Call all allies to assist, dealing 15% more damage. If the target is defeated, dispel all debuffs on allies, grant them 50% Turn Meter and this abilitys cooldown is reduced by 3.

While the Clone Commander is active, all characters' Speed is set to 150 and can't be changed. At the start of each enemy's turn all Clone Trooper allies gain 15% Turn Meter. For each active Clone Trooper ally, the Clone Commander deals 10% more damage while attacking.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain 50% Turn Meter on a critical hit.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and remove 50% of their Turn Meters.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call target ally to assist. These attacks have +50% Critical Chance. Clone Sergeant and the target ally gain Critical Damage Up for 2 turns.
Clone Sergeant gains 4.5% Critical Chance for each living Clone ally. In addition, he has +10% Critical Damage and Offense Up for 2 turns whenever he critically hits.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack can't be evaded by debuffed targets.

Inflict Armor Shred on target enemy, which can't be resisted. If the target already had Armor Shred, also Expose them 3 times for 2 turns and then Clone Sharpshooter attacks using his Basic ability. This ability cant be evaded.
Expose all enemies for 2 turns, which cant be evaded. Clone Sharpshooter Stealths for 3 turns.
When Clone Sharpshooter uses his Basic ability while Stealthed, he dispels his Stealth and deals 75% more damage until the end of the turn.

dynamicDescriptionList.unitNameKey: Clone Trooper, Clone Lieutenant, Clone Captain

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Damage Over Time for 3 turns.
Gain Taunt and Defense Up for 3 turns and Retribution for 2 turns.
While this Clone is buffed, he recovers Protection equal to the damage he deals with his Basic ability.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down for 2 turns. If the target already had Offense Down, call an ally to assist dealing 25% more damage.
Equalize all allies' Health and then heal them for 15% of their Max Protection. Then Clone Trooper Medic Stealths for 2 turns.
Revive a random ally with 50% Health. Clone Trooper Medic takes bonus damage equal to 50% of his Max Health.
When another ally drops below either 100% or 50% Health, Clone Medic gains 25% Turn Meter, doubled while Stealthed.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to grant Foresight to a random ally that doesn't have it for 2 turns. If all allies are buffed, deal double damage.
Dispel all debuffs from all allies and grant them the opposite buffs, if any, for 2 turns. All allies that were not debuffed gain Retribution for 2 turns. General Kenobi gains 60% Turn Meter.

Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant a random other ally Offense Up for 2 turns. Call all other buffed allies to assist, dealing 30% less damage. Jedi Knight Anakin and Ahsoka Tano are not affected by this damage penalty.

At the end of his turn, General Kenobi has a 65% chance to gain Foresight for 2 turns.

Whenever another ally is critically hit, if General Kenobi is alive, they gain Critical Hit Immunity for 1 turn and General Kenobi Taunts for 1 turn.

If all allies are Galactic Republic, General Kenobi Taunts for 1 turn whenever another Galactic Republic ally loses any Protection Up.

Jedi and Clone allies have +30% Max Health and +70% Defense. After a Jedi ally uses a team healing Special ability, all other allies at full health are called to Assist, dealing 50% less damage. When a Clone ally uses a Special ability they gain a buff (Attacker: Advantage, Support: Stealth, Tank: Taunt) for 1 turn.

Deal Special damage to target enemy and inflict Potency Down for 1 Turn. If that enemy has 50% or more Health, Yoda gains 40% Turn Meter and Foresight for 2 turns. If that enemy has less than 50% Health, Yoda gains Offense Up and Defense Penetration Up for 2 turns.

Deal Special damage to all enemies. In addition, for each positive status effect an enemy has, Grand Master Yoda gains that effect for 3 turns. ([c][ffff33]Unique[-][/c] status effects can't be copied.) Grand Master Yoda gains an immediate bonus turn as long as there is one other living Jedi ally.
Deal Special damage to target enemy and remove 70% Turn Meter. If that enemy had less than 100% Health, they are also Stunned for 1 turn.

Yoda gains Tenacity Up, Protection Up (30%), and Foresight for 2 turns, then grants each ally every non-unique buff he has (excluding Stealth and Taunt) for 2 turns. Yoda grants himself +35% Turn Meter and an additional +10% Turn Meter for each other living Jedi ally.

Jedi allies have +30% Tenacity. Whenever a Jedi ally Resists a debuff, they gain the following: 30% Turn Meter, Critical Chance Up for 2 turns, and Critical Damage Up for 2 turns. Whenever they suffer a debuff, they gain Tenacity Up for 1 turn at the end of that turn. Grand Master Yoda is immune to Shock.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Defense Down for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If that enemy was debuffed, this attack deals double damage and Ki-Adi-Mundi recovers Protection equal to the damage dealt.
Gain Offense Up, Tenacity Up, Critical Damage Up, and Retribution for 2 turns. For each debuffed enemy, Ki-Adi-Mundi gains 15% Turn Meter.

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityNameKey: No Such Thing as Luck [c][ffff33](Elite only)[-][/c]
dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Ki-Adi-Mundi's attacks can't be countered. When attacking out of turn, Ki-Adi-Mundi always critically hits.
Dispel all buffs on target enemy and deal true damage equal to 35% of their Max Health. This attack can't be evaded and the damage can't be reduced.

Reduce target enemy's Max Protection by 50% until the end of the battle if they have no dispellable buffs. Then, deal true damage to target enemy equal to 50% of their Max Health. This attack can't be evaded and the damage can't be reduced.
Mace Windu's damage instantly defeats Jango Fett.
Mace Windu's abilities inflict Shatterpoint for 2 turns. He also deals massive damage to enemies with Shatterpoint.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies. If this attack scores at least 3 critical hits, all allies gain Critical Damage Up for 2 turns. Otherwise, all allies are Exposed for 2 turns.
Inflict 2 Damage Over Time debuffs and Speed Down on target enemy for 2 turns. This attack can't be evaded.
Padawan Anakin has +50% Critical Damage. Padawan Anakin always critically hits, and is always critically hit by enemy attacks.
While buffed, Padawan Anakin deals 20% more damage and has 100% counter chance.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy, which can't be evaded. All Galactic Republic allies gain Protection Up (10%, does not stack with itself) for 1 turn.

Dispel all debuffs on Light Side allies, and they recover 50% Health. For each Galactic Republic ally and each debuff dispelled from themselves, Galactic Republic allies gain Protection Up (10%, stacking) for 1 turn.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and Stun them for 1 turn, which can't be copied or dispelled. Then, call all Light Side allies with Protection Up and Padawan Anakin to assist.

Padm is immune to Fear. Whenever a Light Side ally loses Protection Up, they recover 5% Health. Allies can't gain or lose bonus Turn Meter.\n\nWhenever an enemy attacks out of turn against a Galactic Republic ally, that ally gains Protection Up (10%, does not stack with itself) for 1 turn, increased to 40% if Padm is their leader. This Protection Up can't be prevented or dispelled.

Light Side allies have +50% Max Health, and while they have Protection Up they resist all debuffs and can't be critically hit.

At the start of their turn, Galactic Republic allies dispel Protection Up buffs on themselves and gain 1 stack of [c][ffff33]Courage[-][/c] for each 5% Protection Up dispelled this way. Courage can't be copied, dispelled, or prevented.

[c][ffff33]Courage:[-][/c] When damaging the target enemy with an attack, for each 5 stacks of Courage, dispel 5 stacks and deal bonus damage equal to 40% of the target's Max Health
Dispel all buffs on target enemy, deal Physical damage to them, and grant Offense Up for 1 turn to all allies who didn't already have it.

Dispel all debuffs on all allies. Call all Clone Trooper allies to assist. If target ally is a Clone Trooper, he gains 100% Turn Meter.

Target ally gains buffs for 3 turns based on their role:
- Attacker: Stealth and Critical Chance Up
- Support or Healer: Speed Up and Tenacity Up
- Tank: Taunt and Critical Hit Immunity

Call target other ally to assist, and if they are a Clone Trooper, they attack again. Shaak Ti and target ally recover 35% of their Health and Protection.

If target ally is a Clone Trooper, they gain 25% Critical Damage (max 5 stacks) until the end of the battle.

If target ally is a Galactic Republic Jedi, they gain 25% Tenacity (max 5 stacks) until the end of the battle.

Whenever Shaak Ti or a Clone Trooper ally takes damage from an attack, Shaak Ti gains 20% Turn Meter.\n\nWhenever Shaak Ti or a Clone Trooper ally takes damage from an attack, they gain Retribution for 2 turns at the end of that turn.

Clone Trooper allies have +35 Speed. Clone Trooper allies recover 5% Health and Protection when they attack out of turn.\n\nAt the start of the battle, Galactic Republic allies have +15% Max Health, +5% Max Protection, and +15% Offense for each Clone Trooper ally.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 35% chance to call an ally to Assist. If the assisting ally is a Jedi, they deal 50% more damage.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and recover Health equal to 65% of the damage dealt.
Aayla has +10% Critical Chance, 65% Counter Chance and +50% Counter Damage. In addition, she Stuns her target for 1 turn whenever she critically hits.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 45% chance for all allies to recover 6% of Barriss Offee's Max Health.
All allies have their current Health percentages equalized. (Health equalizing effects ignore Healing Immunity.) Then, each ally recovers 15% of their Max Health and gains Defense Up for 2 turns.

At the end of each of her turns, Barriss Dispels all debuffs from the debuffed ally with the lowest Health and gains 10% Turn Meter for each effect removed.\n\nWhenever an ally is Critically Hit, that ally recovers 2% of their Max Health and Barriss gains 10% Turn Meter. This effect is disabled while Barriss is defeated.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Defense Down for 3 turns. If the target is a Droid, this attack has a 100% chance.
Deal Special damage to target enemy with a 75% chance to Stun for 1 turn and a 100% chance to inflict Ability Block for 3 turns if the target is a Droid.
Eeth Koth has +35% Critical Chance and +20% Critical Damage when attacking Droids.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Defense Down for 2 turns. If the target is a Droid, this attack deals 100% more damage and has a 100% chance to inflict Defense Down.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant all allies Defense Up for 3 turns.
Ima-Gun Di recovers 15% of his Max Health each turn for 3 turns whenever he suffers a Critical Hit.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 30% chance to attack again. Kit Fisto has a 50% chance to gain 15% Turn Meter with each attack.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and grant all allies Potency Up for 3 turns.
Kit Fisto has 35% Counter Chance and +20% Offense.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to gain Evasion Up for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Ability Block for 1 turn.
Each ally recovers Health equal to 45% of Luminara Unduli's Max Health, plus an additional 20% of her Max Health on the start of their next 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to reduce Jedi Consular's Cooldowns by 1.
Each ally recovers Health equal to 40% of Jedi Consular's Max Health, with a 50% chance of granting Jedi Consular 25% Turn Meter.
Deal Special damage to target enemy and recover Health equal to 30% of the damage dealt. This attack has a 50% chance to ignore the target's Armor.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 55% chance of inflicting Offense Down for 2 turns.

Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 55% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. This chance is increased to 100% on a Critical Hit. In addition, Jedi Knight Guardian gains Defense Up for 2 turns.
While below 50% Health, Jedi Knight Guardian has +30% Tenacity and recovers 15% of her Max Health at the start of each of her turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with an 80% chance to Expose them for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 70% chance to inflict Defense Down for 2 turns.
Jedi Vanguard Taunts for 2 turns. All allies gain Defense Up for 2 turns.
If Jedi Vanguard has full Health, he has +100% counter chance. Otherwise, he has +100% Offense.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If Jedi Sentinel is not at 100% Health, they recover 10% of their Max Health.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies. If Jedi Sentinel is Stealthed, remove 50% of target enemys Turn Meter.
When Jedi Sentinel takes damage, they gain Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever Jedi Sentinel loses Stealth, they recover 2% of their Max Health.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and grant target ally Critical Hit Immunity for 2 turns.\n\n[c][ffff33]Target Lock:[-][/c] Inflict Offense Down for 2 turns.

Grant target ally Offense Up for 3 turns and all Galactic Republic allies Unending Loyalty for 3 turns, which can't be copied, dispelled, or prevented. Grant all allies Protection Up (25%) for 2 turns.\n\n[c][f0ff23]Unending Loyalty:[-][/c] Can't be defeated during the first enemy attack (including assists) that would otherwise defeat this ship. When reduced to 1% Health, gain Stealth and Protection Up (50%) for 2 turns and recover 25% Health. Then, this buff expires.

Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Daze them for 2 turns. Inflict Target Lock for 2 turns on 2 random enemies that aren't already Target Locked. All allies gain 30% Turn Meter. Grant all Galactic Republic allies Valor for 2 turns, then all allies with Valor are called to assist.

Deal Physical damage to all enemies, place 3 Concussion Mines on them for 1 turn, and increase all enemy cooldowns to max (excludes Capital Ships). These Concussion Mines can't be dispelled, prevented, or resisted. This ability can't be evaded and starts on cooldown.

All allies have +25% Potency and Galactic Republic allies have +25% Accuracy. All enemies deal 25% less damage when attacking out of turn. Galactic Republic allies deal 10% more damage for each other ally with Valor, doubled for Jedi allies. If Anakin's Starfighter is present at the start of battle, it gains Unending Loyalty for 3 turns.\n\n[c][FFCC33]Reinforcement Bonus:[-][/c] Reinforcements gain Critical Damage Up for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns.
Target ally recovers 100% Protection, and gains Taunt and Critical Hit Immunity for 2 turns.

Deal Physical damage to target enemy and all enemies affected by Target Lock, then grant all allies [c][ffff33]Valor[-][/c] for 2 turns. This ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 for each enemy struck.\n\n[c][ffff33]Valor:[-][/c] Grant the Endurance 15% Turn Meter and reduce its ultimate ability's cooldown by 1 at end of turn
All allies gain Protection Up (150%) for 2 turns, which can't be prevented or Dispelled, and Retribution for 2 turns. This ability starts on cooldown.

Allies with Protection have +15% Offense and Defense, doubled for Galactic Republic allies.

[c][FFCC33]Reinforcement Bonus:[-][/c] Reinforcements gain [c][ffff33]Valor[-][/c] for 2 turns.

[c][ffff33]Valor:[-][/c] Grant the Endurance 15% Turn Meter and reduce its ultimate ability's cooldown by 1 at end of turn.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. Target Lock: Daze the target for 2 turns.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down for 2 turns. Target Lock: Call a random ally to assist.
[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Inflict Target Lock on target enemy for 2 turns, which can't be evaded or resisted. All allies gain 15% Turn Meter.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Target Lock for 2 turns, doubled on a Critical Hit.

Deal Physical damage to target enemy, which can't be Evaded. If this attack scores a Critical Hit, recover 20% Protection.\n\n[c][f0ff23]Target Lock:[-][/c] This attack is guaranteed to be a Critical Hit.
Clone Sergeant's ARC-170 gains Defense Up for 2 turns and recovers 65% Protection.
[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Clone Sergeant's ARC-170 gains Protection Up (40%), and Taunts while he has Protection.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Defense Up for 2 turns\n\n[c][f0ff23]Target Lock:[-][/c] Grant another random ally Defense Up for 2 turns.
Deal Special damage to target enemy and call target ally to Assist. Jedi Consular's Starfighter and the assisting ally gain Protection Up (60%) for 2 turns.
Target ally recovers 70% Protection. If that ally is Republic, they recover an additional 30% Protection.
[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] All allies recover 40% Protection.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 70% chance to gain Protection Up (15%) for 2 turns.\n\n[c][f0ff23]Target Lock:[-][/c] Grant another random ally Protection Up (15%) for 2 turns.
All allies gain 40% Turn Meter. All Galactic Republic allies gain Health Up and Protection Recharge (45%) for 2 turns.
Dispel all debuffs on target ally and grant them Taunt and Protection Up (50%) for 2 turns. If target ally is Galactic Republic, grant them Critical Hit Immunity for 2 turns.
[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Dispel all debuffs from all allies and they recover 40% Health and 40% Protection.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Target Lock for 2 turns if they have no buffs or debuffs. Otherwise, remove 20% Turn Meter.
Rex's ARC-170 and another target ally gain 50% Turn Meter and recover 50% Protection. This ability's cooldown is reduced by 1 for each other active Galactic Republic ally.
While Rex's ARC-170 is active, Galactic Republic allies have +10% Tenacity, and whenever an ally Resists a debuff, all other Galactic Republic allies recover 15% Protection.

[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Grant allies a buff for 2 turns, based on their role:
 - [c][B5E7F5]Tank:[-][/c] Defense Up
 - [c][B5E7F5]Support:[-][/c] Health Up (20%)
 - [c][B5E7F5]Attacker:[-][/c] Critical Chance Up
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Offense Down and Defense Down for 2 turns.\n\n[c][f0ff23]Target Lock:[-][/c] Dispel all buffs on Target enemy.
Inflict Target Lock for 2 turns on target enemy, which can't be Resisted, then deal Physical damage to each Target Locked enemy. This attack deals +20% damage for each Target Locked enemy.

Whenever Umbaran Starfighter attacks, it gains 30% Turn Meter and target enemy gains 20% Turn Meter. Additionally, when Umbaran Starfighter attacks, it gains 5% Offense (stacking) and loses 5% Defense (stacking) until the end of the encounter.

[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Remove 25% Turn Meter from all enemies, which can't be Evaded, and grant all allies Defense Up for 2 turns. Then, inflict Target Lock on all enemies with 0% Turn Meter, which can't be Evaded or Resisted.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If the target was debuffed, this attack has +25% Critical Damage. This attack does not remove Buzz Droids.

Deal Physical damage to target enemy and inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns and 3 [c][F0FF23]Buzz Droids[-][/c]. Buzz Droids cant be copied or resisted.\n\n[c][F0FF23]Buzz Droids:[-][/c] -50% Defense and lose 5% Health at start of turn with at least 1 Buzz Droid (max 3); lose 1 Buzz Droid when taking damage from an attack or a Concussion Mine

When another Separatist or Droid ally uses an ability during their turn, the Vulture Droid is called to assist if the target enemy has Buzz Droids.

At the start of each enemy's turn, if they have at least 1 Buzz Droid, the Buzz Droids reset to 3. At the end of each turn, if an enemy's Buzz Droids were dispelled, inflict Ability Block on that enemy for 1 turn, which can't be resisted.

When this Vulture Droid is defeated, it summons another Vulture Droid if the allied Capital Ship is Separatist and there is an allied combatant.
[c][f0ff23]Enter Battle:[-][/c] Inflict 1 Buzz Droid on all enemies and Blind them for 2 turns. Additionally, call a random Droid ally to assist.
